title: Salvation Ch.6
body:
WARNING: CONTAINS ENDGAME SPOILERS

ANGST

Tags are open

Pairing: Tony Stark x Stark!reader, Peter Parker x Reader (eventually)


Tony, Steve, and Thor looked around when portals started to open. T’challa appeared along with Okyere, Shuri and the tribes. Other portals started opening up, Tony scanned every single one, he slowly started to panic when he didn’t see Y/N. He did sigh in relief when he saw Peter come out of the portals. Tony looked back at T’challa. T’challa smiled at the man and moved to the side. There she was, staring at Peter and Peter staring back at her. Y/N looked around and was met with her father’s brown eyes filled with tears, her eyes filled with tears and she smiled at him. Tony smiled back at his daughter. Y/N wanted to make her way towards him but was stopped by T’challa, Y/N looked at him and he handed her a shield along with a sword. Steve stood in front of the group.

“Is that everyone?” Dr. Strange asked

“What you wanted more?” Wong asked annoyed

Scott appeared from the rubble dropping Rhodey, Rocket, and Bruce. Y/N smiled at her uncles. Pepper appeared in her suit, she turned back to look for Y/N and she smiled a let out a sob. Y/N months

‘'I’m ok.” Pepper nodded turning her attention back to Thano’s army.

“AVENGERS.”

Everyone took a ready stance.

“ASSEMBLE.”  

They were off.  Y/N could feel her legs burn as she ran through Thano’s men. Nat taught her how to find, she always told her you may never know when it might come in handy. Tony and Pepper fought alongside each other, he landed on the floor blasting the aliens when he got hit and smashed into the rocks. Tony tried to fire at him when a web caught onto the creature and pulled him away, Scott finished it off by stepping on him. Peter looked around for Y/N when he found her, he shot his web at her and pulled her towards him. Peter swung them to Tony, he lifted him up and Tony’s masked come off

“Hey, holy cow. You’re not going to believe what’s been going on. Do you remember when we were in space?” Tony’s eyes filled with tears

“And I got all dusty? And I must of past out cause I woke up and you were gone, but Dr. Strange was there and he was like it’s been 5 years come on they need us and then he started doing the yellow sparkly thing that he does all the time.” Peter started doing the hand motions. Tony stumbled his way

“What are you doing?” Peter asked. Tony wrapped his arms around the boy and Peter did the same. Tony could feel the tears running down his face

“Oh…oh… This is nice.” Tony hugged Peter harder. Tony pulled away from Peter and looked at his daughter

“Hi, dad.”

“Bug.” Y/N cried as she ran into his arms.

“I missed you.”

“I missed you too.”

The two pulled away from each other and Tony caressed her face. Y/N let out a small laugh

“Dad, you look older.”

“Hey, I look great.” Y/N rolled her eyes

“Always.” Y/N turned to Peter checking his face and sighed in relief that he wasn’t hurt. She turned back to her father and look at the cut on his head

“You gotta be careful old man.”

“I’m always careful.”

“Sure.”

“Y/N I need help.” Y/N turned back and looked at Shuri

“Go.” Her dad said, Y/N nodded and ran towards Shuri

“Hey, Pete.”

“Mr. Stark?”

“I know you like my daughter. Take care of her. Treat her right.” Peter blushed

“Mr. Stark, I-”

“You have my blessing to date. Just take care of each other. Promise.”

“I promise.”

“Good. Now let’s get this son of a bitch.”

Clint ran through the battle

“Hey, Cap? What do you want me to do with this damn thing?” Clint motioned to the gauntlet.

“Get those stones far away as possible.”

“No!” Bruce yelled

“We need to get them back where they came from.”

“There’s no way to get them back. Thanos destroyed the quantum tunnel.” Tony replied

“Hold on,” Scott shrunk down

“That wasn’t our only time machine.” The car alarm went off. Steve looked around

“Does anyone see an ugly brown van?”

“Yes, but you’re not going to like where it’s parked,” Valkyrie replied.

“Scott how long till it works?” Tony asked

“Umm, maybe 10 minutes.”

“Get it started, we’ll get the stones to you,” Steve replied.

Tony landed in front of Dr. Strange and asked

“Hey, you said out of 14 million we win 1. Is this is?”

“If I tell you it won’t happen.” Tony nodded.

Y/N could feel her body giving out, but she had to continue, she couldn’t stop. She had to keep fighting for her family.

“Sir.” Thaos turned towards Clint, he made his way over and Tony made his way to stop him.

“Clint, give it to me.” Clint passed the stones to T'challa and he ran. Thanos knocked T'challa over and Wanda appeared in front of Thanos. Y/N looked at Wanda

“Oh shit, she’s pissed.”

“Yup.” Pepper replied

T'challa made his way back to the stones and Peter took it out of his hands.

“Activate instant kill.”

Peter kept giving himself a pep talk

“Hey, Peter?” Y/N asked

“Yeah?”

“You sure you got this?”

“No yeah, totally.”

“Uh huh.” Y/N rolled her eyes

“Men…” She mumbled

She made her way to help Peter, she killed every single alien that headed her way.

Thanos yelled out for his minion to rain fire, next thing Y/N feels is being knocked to the ground

“Y/N!” Peter made his way and dragged her out of the firing zone and hid by a rock, Peter covered her with his body as the lasers kept shooting. Then it stopped, the shots turn to the sky

“F.R.I.D.A.Y what are they shooting at?”

“Something just entered the upper atmosphere.”

Then the ship went down, Carol made her entrance and everyone smiled. Y/N groaned and coughed, Peter looked down at her.

“Hey, hey… You okay?” Y/N opened her eyes to meet with Peter’s brown ones, now that she got a closer look they were the color of the earth, but just as rain hits, they were warm and inviting, they made her feel like home. Peter could feel Y/N’s breathing getting heavier, he looked at her with worry.

“Y/N, you ok?” She blinked

“Yeah..I’m fine.” They continued to just stare at each other until they heard a cough. The two teens turned their attention to the person. Carol stood in front of the teens.

“Hi… I’m Peter Parker.”

“Y/N Stark. Umm Pete, you can get off of me now.”

“Oh right.” Peter quickly stood up

“Sorry.” Y/N shook her head and stood

“Hi, Peter Parker, Miss Stark. You got something for me?” Peter grabbed the gauntlet and looked towards the army coming after them

“I have no idea how you’re going to get it through that.”

Wanda, Valkyrie, Pepper, Okoye, Mantis, Shuri, Hope, Gamora and Nebula appeared

“Don’t worry she’s got help.”

Y/N looked at Peter

“You’re bleeding.”

“Am I?” Y/N nodded

“Is that because of me?” Peter shook his head

“No, got it earlier.”

“Looks like I’ll have to patch you up.” Peter smiled at her

“Yes, ma'am.” 

They watched as the group of women warriors made their way through the field, then the van exploded. Thanos destroyed the van. The gauntlet landed in front of Tony and Thanos and they fought. Thanos grabbed the gauntlet and Carol stopped him, he tried and tried to get rid of her but he couldn’t then he grabbed the power stone and moved it to his other hand, punching Carol knocking her out. Tony stared at Thanos and looked at Dr. Strange. Strange held up 1 finger. Tony gulped and nodded. Tony stood and grabbed the gauntlet, Thanos kicked Tony away. Thanos smirked

“ I am inevitable.” He snapped his fingers and everyone winced but nothing happened. Tony kneeled and held up his arm, the stones fitting perfectly on his iron suit. Y/N looked at her father

“NO!” she screamed and ran towards him.

“And I….Am….Iron…Man.” he snapped his fingers. White, white was all Tony could see, his body felt like it was on fire; he wanted to scream out but he couldn’t.

“NO!” Y/N screamed and fell to her knees a couple feet away from her father. She watched as Thano’s army turned to dust. Thanos looked around with a defeated look on his face. Y/N laughed through her tears

“You. Lost.” Thanos stared at her, he slowly made his way over to sit on the ruble and turned to dust. Y/N stood and made her way to her father, Rhodey and Peter appeared next to her. Rhodey caressed Tony’s face.

“Mr. Stark. Hey,” Peter said in a shaky voice

“Mr. Stark, can you hear me? It’s Peter.” Tony said nothing and stared at the boy. Peter’s voice became strained and tears slowly ran down his cheeks.

“We won, Mr. Stark. We won Mr. Stark. We won. You did it, sir, you did it. I’m sorry… Don't…” Peter couldn’t even finish his sentence, Y/N placed a hand on Peter’s shoulder and he moved over.

“Dad… Hey dad.” Tony looked at his daughter, Y/N could see a flash of sadness in his eyes

“Bug..” He barely managed to say

“I love you..” Y/N said as she caressed his cheek

“I….love…you…forever….and….always.” Y/N let out a choked sob and smiled

“Forever and always.” she kissed her dad’s cheek one last time. Pepper placed her hand on Y/N shoulder and she moved to sit next to Peter. Peter wrapped his arms around her and they both silently cried while holding each other.

“Hey,” Tony turned and looked at Pepper

“Pep..” She placed her hand over his

“F.R.I.D.A.Y?”

“Life functions critical.” Tony smiled at her and looked at his daughter, tears filled his eyes and he gave her a reassuring smile, Y/N gave him one back.

“Tony.” Tony looked away

“Look at me.” He turned his gaze back to Pepper

“Hmm..”

“We’re gonna be okay.” Pepper smiled and Tony looked away. All he could think about was them, Pepper, Peter, Y/N, and Morgan. He kept them safe, he kept everyone safe, he felt at peace. Tony smiled.

“You can rest now,” Pepper said while running her fingers through his hair and Tony breathed in one final breath and then the light went off. Pepper cried and kissed his cheek, everyone around them started to cry. Y/N felt her heart shatter into a million pieces. Peter just sat there and held onto the broken girl. Steve made his way towards Pepper and hugged her. Y/N unwrapped herself from Peter, stood while holding his hand and made their way to Steve and Pepper, they hugged. They all stood in silence, all you could hear were the sounds of whimpers. Steve made his way and lifted Tony up, he carried him away from the battle and carried him home. Everyone quietly followed the Captain.


Tags:

@ziggyspurplehaze

@ghost-brocolli

@a-sweet-little-fangirl

@imafreakingtaco

@karlitabi-rrito

@rexorangecouny

@outsider-underwater

@alisoncdariel

@too-involved

@laurxn-robinson

Wanda, Valkyrie, Pepper, Okoye, Mantis, Shuri, Hope, Gamora and Nebula appeared

“Don’t worry she’s got help.”

Y/N looked at Peter

“You’re bleeding.”

“Am I?” Y/N nodded

“Is that because of me?” Peter shook his head

“No, got it earlier.”

“Looks like I’ll have to patch you up.” Peter smiled at her

“Yes, ma'am.” 

They watched as the group of women warriors made their way through the field, then the van exploded. Thanos destroyed the van. The gauntlet landed in front of Tony and Thanos and they fought. Thanos grabbed the gauntlet and Carol stopped him, he tried and tried to get rid of her but he couldn’t then he grabbed the power stone and moved it to his other hand, punching Carol knocking her out. Tony stared at Thanos and looked at Dr. Strange. Strange held up 1 finger. Tony gulped and nodded. Tony stood and grabbed the gauntlet, Thanos kicked Tony away. Thanos smirked

“ I am inevitable.” He snapped his fingers and everyone winced but nothing happened. Tony kneeled and held up his arm, the stones fitting perfectly on his iron suit. Y/N looked at her father

“NO!” she screamed and ran towards him.

“And I….Am….Iron…Man.” he snapped his fingers. White, white was all Tony could see, his body felt like it was on fire; he wanted to scream out but he couldn’t.

“NO!” Y/N screamed and fell to her knees a couple feet away from her father. She watched as Thano’s army turned to dust. Thanos looked around with a defeated look on his face. Y/N laughed through her tears

“You. Lost.” Thanos stared at her, he slowly made his way over to sit on the ruble and turned to dust. Y/N stood and made her way to her father, Rhodey and Peter appeared next to her. Rhodey caressed Tony’s face.

“Mr. Stark. Hey,” Peter said in a shaky voice

“Mr. Stark, can you hear me? It’s Peter.” Tony said nothing and stared at the boy. Peter’s voice became strained and tears slowly ran down his cheeks.

“We won, Mr. Stark. We won Mr. Stark. We won. You did it, sir, you did it. I’m sorry… Don't…” Peter couldn’t even finish his sentence, Y/N placed a hand on Peter’s shoulder and he moved over.

“Dad… Hey dad.” Tony looked at his daughter, Y/N could see a flash of sadness in his eyes

“Bug..” He barely managed to say

“I love you..” Y/N said as she caressed his cheek

“I….love…you…forever….and….always.” Y/N let out a choked sob and smiled

“Forever and always.” she kissed her dad’s cheek one last time. Pepper placed her hand on Y/N shoulder and she moved to sit next to Peter. Peter wrapped his arms around her and they both silently cried while holding each other.

“Hey,” Tony turned and looked at Pepper

“Pep..” She placed her hand over his

“F.R.I.D.A.Y?”

“Life functions critical.” Tony smiled at her and looked at his daughter, tears filled his eyes and he gave her a reassuring smile, Y/N gave him one back.

“Tony.” Tony looked away

“Look at me.” He turned his gaze back to Pepper

“Hmm..”

“We’re gonna be okay.” Pepper smiled and Tony looked away. All he could think about was them, Pepper, Peter, Y/N, and Morgan. He kept them safe, he kept everyone safe, he felt at peace. Tony smiled.

“You can rest now,” Pepper said while running her fingers through his hair and Tony breathed in one final breath and then the light went off. Pepper cried and kissed his cheek, everyone around them started to cry. Y/N felt her heart shatter into a million pieces. Peter just sat there and held onto the broken girl. Steve made his way towards Pepper and hugged her. Y/N unwrapped herself from Peter, stood while holding his hand and made their way to Steve and Pepper, they hugged. They all stood in silence, all you could hear were the sounds of whimpers. Steve made his way and lifted Tony up, he carried him away from the battle and carried him home. Everyone quietly followed the Captain.

Tony, Steve, and Thor looked around when portals started to open. T’challa appeared along with Okyere, Shuri and the tribes. Tony looked back at T’challa. T’challa smiled at the man and moved to the side. There she was, staring at Peter and Peter staring back at her. Y/N looked around and was met with her father’s brown eyes filled with tears, her eyes filled with tears and she smiled at him. Tony smiled back at his daughter. Y/N wanted to make her way towards him but was stopped by T’challa, Y/N looked at him and he handed her a shield along with a sword. Steve stood in front of the group.

“Is that everyone?” Dr. Strange asked

“What you wanted more?” Wong asked annoyed

Scott appeared from the rubble dropping Rhodey, Rocket, and Bruce. Y/N smiled at her uncles. Pepper appeared in her suit, she turned back to look for Y/N and she smiled a let out a sob. Y/N months

‘'I’m ok.” Pepper nodded turning her attention back to Thano’s army.

“AVENGERS.”

Everyone took a ready stance.

“ASSEMBLE.”  

They were off.  Y/N could feel her legs burn as she ran through Thano’s men. Nat taught her how to find, she always told her you may never know when it might come in handy. Tony and Pepper fought alongside each other, he landed on the floor blasting the aliens when he got hit and smashed into the rocks. Tony tried to fire at him when a web caught onto the creature and pulled him away, Scott finished it off by stepping on him. Peter looked around for Y/N when he found her, he shot his web at her and pulled her towards him. Peter swung them to Tony, he lifted him up and Tony’s masked come off

“Hey, holy cow. You’re not going to believe what’s been going on. Do you remember when we were in space?” Tony’s eyes filled with tears

“And I got all dusty? And I must of past out cause I woke up and you were gone, but Dr. Strange was there and he was like it’s been 5 years come on they need us and then he started doing the yellow sparkly thing that he does all the time.” Peter started doing the hand motions. Tony stumbled his way

“What are you doing?” Peter asked. Tony wrapped his arms around the boy and Peter did the same. Tony could feel the tears running down his face

“Oh…oh… This is nice.” Tony hugged Peter harder. Tony pulled away from Peter and looked at his daughter

“Hi, dad.”

“Bug.” Y/N cried as she ran into his arms.

“I missed you.”

“I missed you too.”

The two pulled away from each other and Tony caressed her face. Y/N let out a small laugh

“Dad, you look older.”

“Hey, I look great.” Y/N rolled her eyes

“Always.” Y/N turned to Peter checking his face and sighed in relief that he wasn’t hurt. She turned back to her father and look at the cut on his head

“You gotta be careful old man.”

“I’m always careful.”

“Sure.”

“Y/N I need help.” Y/N turned back and looked at Shuri

“Go.” Her dad said, Y/N nodded and ran towards Shuri

“Hey, Pete.”

“Mr. Stark?”

“I know you like my daughter. Take care of her. Treat her right.” Peter blushed

“Mr. Stark, I-”

“You have my blessing to date. Just take care of each other. Promise.”

“I promise.”

“Good. Now let’s get this son of a bitch.”

Clint ran through the battle

“Hey, Cap? What do you want me to do with this damn thing?” Clint motioned to the gauntlet.

“Get those stones far away as possible.”

“No!” Bruce yelled

“We need to get them back where they came from.”

“There’s no way to get them back. Thanos destroyed the quantum tunnel.” Tony replied

“Hold on,” Scott shrunk down

“That wasn’t our only time machine.” The car alarm went off. Steve looked around

“Does anyone see an ugly brown van?”

“Yes, but you’re not going to like where it’s parked,” Valkyrie replied.

“Scott how long till it works?” Tony asked

“Umm, maybe 10 minutes.”

“Get it started, we’ll get the stones to you,” Steve replied.

Tony landed in front of Dr. Strange and asked

“Hey, you said out of 14 million we win 1. Is this is?”

“If I tell you it won’t happen.” Tony nodded.

Y/N could feel her body giving out, but she had to continue, she couldn’t stop. She had to keep fighting for her family.

“Sir.” Thaos turned towards Clint, he made his way over and Tony made his way to stop him.

“Clint, give it to me.” Clint passed the stones to T'challa and he ran. Thanos knocked T'challa over and Wanda appeared in front of Thanos. Y/N looked at Wanda

“Oh shit, she’s pissed.”

“Yup.” Pepper replied

T'challa made his way back to the stones and Peter took it out of his hands.

“Activate instant kill.”

Peter kept giving himself a pep talk

“Hey, Peter?” Y/N asked

“Yeah?”

“You sure you got this?”

“No yeah, totally.”

“Uh huh.” Y/N rolled her eyes

“Men…” She mumbled

She made her way to help Peter, she killed every single alien that headed her way.

Thanos yelled out for his minion to rain fire, next thing Y/N feels is being knocked to the ground

“Y/N!” Peter made his way and dragged her out of the firing zone and hid by a rock, Peter covered her with his body as the lasers kept shooting. Then it stopped, the shots turn to the sky

“F.R.I.D.A.Y what are they shooting at?”

“Something just entered the upper atmosphere.”

Then the ship went down, Carol made her entrance and everyone smiled. Y/N groaned and coughed, Peter looked down at her.

“Hey, hey… You okay?” Y/N opened her eyes to meet with Peter’s brown ones, now that she got a closer look they were the color of the earth, but just as rain hits, they were warm and inviting, they made her feel like home. Peter could feel Y/N’s breathing getting heavier, he looked at her with worry.

“Y/N, you ok?” She blinked

“Yeah..I’m fine.” They continued to just stare at each other until they heard a cough. The two teens turned their attention to the person. Carol stood in front of the teens.

“Hi… I’m Peter Parker.”

“Y/N Stark. Umm Pete, you can get off of me now.”

“Oh right.” Peter quickly stood up

“Sorry.” Y/N shook her head and stood

“Hi, Peter Parker, Miss Stark. You got something for me?” Peter grabbed the gauntlet and looked towards the army coming after them

summary: Seriously, Peter Parker just lost his one of his greatest mentors and father figures, Nick Fury not only keeps calling him, but...
body:
Seriously, Peter Parker just lost his one of his greatest mentors and father figures, Nick Fury not only keeps calling him, but hijacks his vacation, which was the first chance for him to take a break from superheroism and spend time with his friends and the girl he likes, and then Fury also gives him a NEW SUIT knowing FULL-WELL Peter’s current suit now holds extremely sentimental value for him…

If you ask me, the only thing stopping Peter from telling Fury to go f*** himself was his sense of duty and the fact that kids would be watching this movie.

title: You're not Dead?
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2HQj3c8

by bethy_277

This was done for an anon prompt on Agib’s Tumblr. I saw it, and asked for permission to write it.

The request was Peter thinks that Tony is dead, and Tony keeps it that way to keep Peter safe, only Pepper, Rhodey and Happy know he’s alive. It’s not until Peter starts to go towards suicide that Tony steps in and tells Peter he did it to protect him.

I took it a little further.

summary: Some People Move On, But Not Us
title: Some People Move On, But Not Us
description:
by StarPrince_Punk

“Your dad was one of the best people I’ve ever met, you know?”
“Really?”
“Yeah. H-He,” Peter wiped the little tears pricking at his eyes, “h-he w-was like, like a father to me.”
“So, does that mean, you’re like my big brother?”
Peter’s wet eyes met Morgan’s dry, innocent ones. “Uh, well-”
“Daddy would sometimes call you my big brother.”
———
Peter has cried everyday since Tony Stark… since he… you know. He goes to see Pepper and Morgan for the first time since the funeral, and Morgan tells Peter all the things her dad said about him while he was dusted. Peter just wishes he could hear Tony say those things to him in person.

This fic focuses on Peter Parker and Morgan Stark as they try to cope with Tony Stark’s death after the events of Avengers: Endgame

Warning: This is REALLY sad. Tony Stark is my favorite Marvel character and this is how I mourned him. I’ve cried awhile writing this fic, so don’t read this unless you wanna cry too. I apologize in advance.

blog.description: Expect books, politics, animals, and whatever else catches my interest or ire.

title: MCU Musings
body:
I don’t think I would even be staying with the MCU if it wasn’t for Sam and Bucky.  I’d say Clint as well, but I have a feeling that, as usual, he will be essentially overlooked.  My hope is that the Black Widow prequel movie will include both Clint and Phil.  And give us the story behind Budapest!!


Another thought after watching the previews for Spiderman: Far from Home, all I could think was that Tony Stark would NEVER have approved of Nick Fury coming anywhere near his kid.  Sadly it might only be Happy who can try to keep Fury from destroying Peter.


One last thought.  I began reading Spider-Man when he first appeared in the comics and was hooked, loving to see a character that could be related to.  Peter dealt with shyness, homework, crushes, and all the many other Real Life things that normal kids dealt with.  It was something you saw so much more of in the Marvel comics than in DC which definitely attracted me even as an eight year old.  I’ve watched and been terribly disappointed in the actors who have played Peter Parker over the years.  I love Tom Holland because he appears to be the proper age and attitude for Peter.  He truly is the best I’ve ever seen.
